name: Super Market Saver
description:
In times when even necessary things are in short supply, a supermarket must stand firm and try to stay alive.

 Your goal:

  • Shop and fill the shelves with supplies
  • Buyers will clump so "help" them to loosen the clump
  • Buy advantages through Items
  • Make the most money

Challenge yourself with 10 different levels with different customers. Have fun!
